title: RHOSLC Mary Triggered + RHOP Vow Renewal
itunes:title: RHOSLC Mary Triggered + RHOP Vow Renewal
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured an awkward appearance by someone from Mary's past (a setup!), a Fresh Wolf event, Heather's booze cruise, a chest purse, and more. On The Real Housewives of Potomac finale, Ka...
description:
Danny recaps The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured an awkward appearance by someone from Mary's past (a setup!), a Fresh Wolf event, Heather's booze cruise, a chest purse, and more. On The Real Housewives of Potomac finale, Karen and Ray renew vows, Macy Gray performs a new hit from 2001, and Juan meets with Michael.


RHOP: 22:32ish


PREORDER DANNY'S NEW BOOK HERE: http://smarturl.it/unremember


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
